content: Financially Preparing for Change in Job Status

content: prepare for life's events: changing/losing a job

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td font span
content: Changing jobs, even when it's your choice, can be unsettling. Losing a job can be devastating. Regardless of the details, you probably have some doubts about the future. Can you survive financially, and for how long? What do you do with funds from your previous employer’s retirement plan?

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p font span
content: Evaluate all of the resources that are available to you. Do you have the necessary insurance coverage to protect yourself and your family? Although it may not be easy, think beyond the short term. Your new situation may impact your long-term investment strategies.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p font sup span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p font span
content: Adjustments to your retirement plans or your children’s college savings plans may be required.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td sup span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td span
content: Securities offered through Registered Representatives of MML Investors Services, Inc.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div div a span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div div a span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div div a span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div div a span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div div a span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td span
content: Select from the solutions on the left to learn how the MassMutual Financial Group companies can help you take stock of your new circumstances.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td span
content: What do you intend to do with your retirement plan assets at this time? You may want to consider rolling the assets in your qualified plan into an annuity-funded IRA. While funding your IRA with an annuity offers no additional tax-advantage, there are unique annuity features to consider. These include multiple investment choices, living benefits, death benefits, and the ability to create a stream of income you can't outlive.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td sup span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td span
content: Whether you're finally pursuing your real interests or coming back to the work force after some time off, MassMutual's disability income insurance coverage offers the convenience of portability. No matter where you go or what changes in your life, your policy remains the same and stays with you even when you change jobs.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td span
content: Starting a new job may mean re-examining your insurance needs. If you're concerned about income replacement, a pay raise will mean you need more life insurance. Or maybe you've lost group life insurance coverage from your previous job and you need to replace that employee benefit with individual life insurance. If you find yourself unemployed in the future, owning individual life insurance can provide continued protection.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td span
content: Although you may experience unexpected career developments, your financial goals should remain steady. Mutual funds offer you the benefits of professional management and asset diversification that may help you reach your long-term financial goals.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td sup span
html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td div table tbody tr td span
content: Guaranteed death benefits, living benefits and payment of lifetime income are contingent upon the claims-paying ability of the issuing company or companies.
